1.content:
11:00 P.M

Cesar parked his car into the parking lot and then calmly strided to the hotel where the party was taking place. Normally, Cesar wasn't much for parties, but this was New Years Eve, and besides, one of his good buddies was here. John had invited and paid for Cesar's ticket, all the way from Boston, Massachusetts, his hometown, to glamorous Las Vegas after he won the jackpot. John, a compulsive, reckless fiend, figured that it was serendipity and there was no time like the present to blow $500,000. So after he had won, John called and rounded up every friend and friend of a friend of a friend to celebrate his good fortune.

The hotel was nice enough judging by the lobby, as Cesar figured it would be, so he asked some other pedestrian where the bar was. He knew that John, who had put most frat boys to shame in his day, would be there. The bubbly redhead, who couldn't have been more than eighteen or nineteen, pointed him to a stairwell straight ahead. The bar was in the basement, of course.

Cesar decided to take the elevator and descended into the cavernous but well lit drinking hall. The loud music(thankfully, all classic rock) briefly assaulted Cesar's eardrums, but he acclimated to it soon enough when he asked a barmaid where his friend John was. Pulling out his smart phone, Cesar showed the woman John's picture. She recognized him almost immediately, and directed Cesar to the other side of the room, through the throng of strangers and quasi-acquaintances. Cesar nodded, and after a few minutes, found his friend of twenty plus years sitting down in the farthest corner, in the dark, talking to Kimberly Gadling.

Cesar was really attracted to Kimberly. She had long, silky black hair, a youthful face despite pushing forty, and a rocking body. She was wearing a black form fitting mini-dress under her black leather duster, Matrix style, which made her look really stylish and really mysterious(and really sexy).

Kimberly was the first to notice Cesar.

“Heya, Cesar. What's popping?”

“Not much. Just enjoying the free vacation your boyfriend was nice enough to give me.”

Kimberly turned her head at John, then back at Cesar, and laughed drunkenly.

“My boyfriend? Yeah, right. In his dreams would he be my boyfriend.”

John looked hurt. “That's it. You're out of my will, now.”

John was only kidding of course. Despite having long since been a teenager, he was too irresponsible to have ever thought of writing up a will.

“Don't care. At the end of the hour, this nightmare will all be over” answered Kimberly as she downed another glass of Brandy Alexander.

“Hey Kimberly. You're drinking a lot tonight.”

“It's New Year's.”

John smirked.

“Yeah. But I've never taken you for much of a drinker. Any special reason? Trying to forget something? Or somebody?”

“As a matter of fact, I am.”

Kimberly, drunken and somewhat surly, though no one who looked as cute as her could look very overtly threatening, stared at both of them as Cesar sat down on the chair right next to her.

“I'm trying to forget all of the last seven thousand years I've been stuck as this...” she said, roughly putting down her drink to emphasize her very female form.

“Seven thousand years?” asked John incredulously. He was half amused, and egged her to go on with her rant.

“Yea. I've been stuck as a woman for exactly seven millennium's ev'r since I pissed off some witches. Never found out what I did to the cunts, or how they found the ability to do this. They sent me back in time and told me tonight would be the end. First day they told me this all those years ago, and I never forgot it. January 1st, 2012 is when they're releasing me from this...endless fucking parade of acting flirtatious and having babies and sucking dicks and...”

“You never told me you had kids.”

“I don't. Not in this lifetime. But in the past... Holy shit. I could probably fill Sydney, Australia with all the kids I've pumped out. And don't get me started on all the miscarriages and infants who died ov'r the centuries. Yeah, me. Modern, independent woman. Most of time I've been barefoot and pregnant.”

Kimberly's face looked more taciturn than ever now.

Cesar said “You can't be serious. You're just drunk, aren't you Kim?”

“No! I'm completely serious! All of you people, lovely as you are, are just mayflies to me. All of the things you think you know about the world are...not one hundred percent accurate to say the bloody least.”

"Got any interesting anecdotes? Stories?" asked John.

“We-lll-lll...” said Kimberly, slurring her words “...which one do ya want to hear firs'?"
1.title: A Night To Remember

11.content: Where does her story begin? In 5000 BC or sometime after?
11.title: Story 1

choices: She awakes to find herself in a tribal camp
She awakes to find herself in a deserted location
111.content: "Aw well, what the hell!" Kimberly said, sighing. "I might as well start where this whole ordeal started; otherwise, any other story won't make sense." Kimberly picked up her glass and took a big swig as her two listeners looked on with faces glowing with eager impatience. "All right then. After those damn witches cursed me into a woman and explained what they'd done and why, I blacked out and awoke to find myself in a vastly different location."
111.title: Beginning At The Beginning

choices: Her hiding attempt attracts attention due to noise
She runs into another person in her hiding place
1111.content: "I awoke with a start to find myself lying feet from a campfire. I shifted myself onto my backside and glanced around to see where I'd landed. Hide tents dotted the land for several feet around the campfire. I then looked down at myself and gasped. I had volumptous breasts and an apealingly thin figure. I gulped. If any man saw me, I'd be too tempting to turn down and in this world without birth control, I'd be impregnated. Thus, I scrambled to get up and hide before anyone could notice me."
1111.title: The Reluctant Camper

choices: She is treated as a threat
11111.content: "I scrambled to my feet, in the process tripping over them. A loud thump followed my crash to the ground. Great, I thought. This noise has probably alterted every resident of this village to my prescence. The sudden noise of footfalls confirmed my fear. A forest of feet encircled me. I froze with fear, uncertain of how these people would react to me, an intruder. Would they view me as an invader and treat me as such? Or would I be welcomed as a new addition?"
11111.title: Attracting Attention

choices: It was a woman ready to initiate her into the tribe
It was a man ready to take her as his mate
111111.content: "Fingers wrapped themselves around my arms and I was lifted off the ground. Fear paralyzed me; I wanted to squirm and escape the clutches of my captors but the fear of the consequences if I attempted to escape kept me from acting upon this impulse. Thus, all I could do was remain still, wonder where they were taking me and hope the destination wasn't someplace bad. They led me into a dark tent and released me from thier grasp. At first I couldn't see so I was afraid to move even though I was now free to do so; however, my eyes adjusted and I saw another person in the tent with me."
111111.title: The Welcome Wagon

choices: The man catches her before she can get out of the entrance.
She gets out of the tent but runs into the crowd that brough her there.
1111112.content:
"As soon as I saw who was in the tent with me, I gasped, stepping back. The beard and the flat, hairy chest could mean only one thing--the other person was a man! Since I, now a woman, had been brought to a tent with a man, there could be only one reason for me being here. This man must have no woman yet and so his fellow tribesmen had brought me into his tent so I could be his woman.
"I gulped and took another step back but still not taking my eyes off the man across the tent from me because I couldn't. If I did, he might have a chance to get over to me and I didn't want that. That would be the end of my free life. I would be an impregnated woman belonging to this strange man. Such a situation would end any chances I had to finding any way out of this situation. Thus, I knew, I had to keep my wits about me to avoid such a fate. Consequently, even as I made a swift motion for the entrance, I didn't take my eyes off the man."
1111112.title: The Worst Case Scenario

11111121.content:
But, before I could reach the tent flap, he caught me by the arm and forced me down. I struggled valiantly in his grasp, but people back then were much more physically fit. In my current era female body, I stood no chance. I screamed and screamed as he found his way under my hide clothing and pulled it away.

The less I try to remember about that night, the better. I've had literally thousands of years to go over it again and again in my mind, and it never gets any easier.

Humans were also much more savage back in the beginning.

I was kept in his tent for the next few days, regularly used and abused. They tied me up with the same crude strings they'd used to tie up their tents.

That is the origin of the wedding ring, you know. Back then, people tied their women up to show that they belonged to them and to keep them from running off. As the centuries passed, the ropes became smaller and smaller until they eventually degraded into these little golden rings.

Fortunately, the connotations from whence they came were also dropped.

Now where was I?
11111121.title: He catches her

choices: She leaves to find shelter and comes across men
She leaves to find shelter and comes across some extinct animal
Some men come across her at her current location
1112.content: "I awoke to find myself alone. This came as quite a relief because I was naked. This was especially embarassing in my new forms. I had huge breasts and a pear shaped figure. Great I thought as I looked down at myself. Those bitch witches had to go all out and give me an attractive figure. I threw my arms down with a sigh. This will be too tempting for any man I come across. Oh well. I guess I gotta make the best of this situation and the only way to do that will be to avoid all men. Will that even me possible? I don't know but I gotta try. There's no way I'm getting pregnant."
1112.title: Awakening Alone

choices: The men take kindly to her
11123.content: "However, only seconds after I'd gotten up, a rustling came from behind me, causing me to jump. I turned to find two skantily-clad men emerging from the brush. Hanging at thier sides, clasped in thier hands were spears and clubs. I gulped and took a step back. These were primitive weapons, true, but they could still do a lot of damage. How would their carriers react to me? As an attractive female to be overpowered and taken or an unfamiliar intruder to be killed?"
11123.title: The First Encounter

111231.content: "The men approached me slowly. I began to back away when I felt something touch me on the back. I gasped and turned around to see one of the men had maneuvered his way behind me. Thus, I was now completely surrounded by men so I had nowhere to run. I gulped. What were these men going to do? Claim me as a mate? Or take me back to their home?"
111231.title: A Warm Welcome

I was then chained and took to Rome where I was at first put forward as a female gladiator but some rich roman bought me for his son.

I was raped so many times and eventually became pregnant with his daughter.

I died in childbirth but my consciousness transferred to my daughter that I just gave birth too...

So what you became a baby? "yeah I did" and I was taken on by the fathers mother as her own, she even breastfed me.

I have never been male always female and always into the body of a child I was giving birth too.

Sometimes it was the first child other times it was the 6th child.

It like when was in...

choices: Still in Rome (but you chose who to marry)
Back to the bar with the two guys
11211222.content:
It's was about two generations after I was first reborn...

When I was first reborn once I was old enough I was married of to a cousin of the family when I was 16 as I was the daughter of a celtic slave.

I gave birth 10 times but only two sons and a daughter survived and I became that daughter and that was by the time I was 24.

So my so my grandmother was a celtic noble woman that was a slave but now I was a full roman citizen although I had bigger breast then most roman women due to the celtic dna inside me.

It took two generations to become a full roman citizen... The father of the daughter got a political favour by marrying me of to an old roman senator when I was 14 although my father didn't care for as far as he was concerned I was just a girl, my brothers cared about me and they where both officers in the roman army.

I secretly tought then the celtic language I know and about the religion of their grandmother and I turn they tought what the thought was their little sister the same.

To be honest the senator was a very nice person and treated me like a person and not a object, he even let me bothers move into his villa.

He never forced me into anything and he treated his slaves with dignity although he put on an act when other powerful people came round.

He didn't touch me till I let him when I was about 17 years old... I gave him four sons and three daughters the last one been me...
11211222.title: Some other time

113.content:
"How about I tell you about my experiences in Medieval Europe?" Kimberly said.
"Sure," Cesar said.
"Okay. What story do you want me to tell?"
113.title: Medieval Europe

1133.content:
"Have you ever been royalty?" asked John.

"Ha! Plenty of times. I've been a princess, a duchess, a baroness, a Marquess, a Tsaritsa, and two Queens. But mostly I was poor or middle class."

"Two queens? Which ones?"

"Isabella of Spain and Constance of Sicily. The one who was married to Henry VI. II'm half in the bag, so I'm prob'ly forgetting a couple of others."

Casar and John stared at each other, and then back at Kimberly, who was taking another swig of brandy.

"Well kids, which one you wanna hear?"
1133.title: "My queen story?"

choices: She tell of coming over on a ship
She tells of being a Native American
114.content:
"Would you two be willing to listen to me tell you about the early days of this country?" Kimberly said, taking another swig before setting the glass down again.
"Sure," John and Cesar say in unison.
114.title: Colonial America

12.content: Kimberly looks at the clock and says, "Well seeing that I don't have a lot of time should I start at the begining? Where did I start? It was such a long time ago it's hard to remember sometimes". John laughs and shouts, "That's why chicks shouldn't drink. You loose what little mental stabilty you have after a few". He then breaks out in laughter. Kimberly gives him a stare that seems to stop time. John stops laughing. Kimberly then quickly seems to collect herself and in a brief period of sobriety says, "My young sweat boy you have no idea what the future has in store for you". She then gently slaps him on the face. "Ok, where was I? That's right, should I start in the beginning", she asks slurring her words again.
12.title: Story 2

121.content: Ceaser and John look at each other and then knod their heads. Kimberly smiles and begins, "It was December 31, 2011. I was ringing in the New Year with all my friends, friends I hadn't seen in thousands of years. I figured I would end it where it all started. Anyway I just had a string of luck. The world was my oyster. I was young, handsome, and a man". That last part causes gets some laughs. After they quiet down she continues, "I was having the night of my life. I had already nailed a couple of bitches and figured I'd get a few more before the night was over. I was young and didn't have any respect for women. They were only good for catching my sperm". "Oh yeh, you were my kind of guy, Kimberly", John shouts with his hand up for a high five from Ceaser. Ceaser gives returns the high five and Kimberly continues. "Well the ball dropped and the bitch I was with disappeared with one of my friends, so I started looking for another. It was ok with me, bro's before hoe's and all that. I found this trio of bitches wear very little dancing with each other. I came up and just started dancing with them. They were not very welcoming and walked off. Figured they must be lesbians. I was drunk and undetered, so I went after them. I followed them up to the roof top. I may have shouted a few rude comments at them while they were walking off. When I got up to the roof I was a bit pissed off. I whipped out my cock and said something along the lines how long has it been since you cunt sucking muff divers seen a dick? They looked at each other and then waved there hands muttering some wierd language. Suddenly it was if time had stood still. I felt myself being mentally ripped open like a book. They saw and knew in that instant everything about me. My whole life was laid out in front of me and it wasn't nice. I had done some pretty rotten things. The three started making comments about what a lousy human being I was. Angry I shouted that they had no right to judge me. Right or not they did judge me and then they cursed me. With the wave of their hands I was flung from the rooftop and fell. It was not the pavement below though that I landed on. Instead I fell through for lack of a better word a vortex of colors, of time. When I came to a landing I was in.......................
121.title: The beginning

choices: one of the other Pacific islands

13.content:
"Well, you guys are all into that anime shit these days, ain't ya? So how about a story from one of my many lifetimes spent in Japan?"

"Before the Meiji era and the Reforms of the late 1800's, Japan was an isolated, homogeneous country of peasants and samurai, all sworn to obey their local lords.

All samurai were men, for the most part, so there wasn't much in the way of job advancement for women like me.

In that lifetime, I was born into poverty, as was much of the population. Greed and desperation forced my dirt-farming parents to sell me off to the local brothel. It wasn't a pleasant job, but it kept a roof over my head.

Anyway, one day I was met with a most unusual visitor, inquiring after my services in the art of man-pleasuring.

It was...
13.title: Story 3

info.brief_description: A young man reminisces about the last 7,000 years stuck as a variety of different women.
info.description:
On New Years Eve 2011, two men at a bar listen to their female friend of many years drunkenly ramble on about her many past lives. At first they don't take her that seriously, but over the next hour and beyond, they hear too many minor but mind blowing details which add credence to her story. Her story being this:

A long time ago(actually, the present day), there was a young man who was quite rude and mean towards other people, especially women and little girls. He hated the female sex for many personal reasons of his own, which are slowly unraveled throughout the story. One day, out of the blue, a trio of witches cursed the young man with the most powerful spell they can conjure together, sending him through the sands of time to approximately the year 5,000 B.C.E. He is stuck there as a woman, in the past, with absolutely no recourse and no way of getting out of this dire situation. He is trapped and doomed to spend the next seven thousand years wandering the Earth, occasionally morphing into different women in order to avoid attention and accusations of sorcery.

The main character is unable to kill him/herself, and is equally unable of being killed by others. (S)he is however capable of feeling pain, misery, regret, depression, and sadness, as you will soon see.
